Frameless Glass Fencing

Frameless glass pool fencing is the ultimate in style and elegance when it comes to your pools surrounds.

Semi-Frameless Glass Fencing

Semi-frameless glass pool fencing is the most cost effective type of glass pool fencing. And it's quite stunning.

Glass Balustrade

We have balustrade systems for commercial or residential. Our glass balustrade systems can be frameless, semi frameless or fully framed. Contact us for installation or for DIY (do it yourself).

Learn More
Stair Glass Balustrade

Custom made to meet your exact project requirements. Transform your staircase balustrade into something that is stylish and safe. Call us to discuss how we can help.

About Us

About Millennium Glass

Millennium Glass specialise in a range of glass splashbacks, shower screens, mirrors, sliding wardrobe doors, internal wardrobe shelving, glass pool fencing and balustrading for commercial, DIY and home renovators.
